title: Please Take Care of the Baby! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Academy   Childcare   Childhood Friends   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Magic
author: Yoon Ha-Wol   윤하월
description:
“Maau.”
It’s obviously wiggling on my bed… “Baby?”

Elena Velotte, an ordinary academy student, tried to rest well for a long time after the final exam, but a strange baby appears in her room. 

Elena, who suddenly raised a child with Felix, a childhood friend and one of the best geniuses at the academy.

“Oh, Boo, Boo!”
But the kid is so cute! Besides, Felix, who she thought was only rough, also showed a soft side to the child…

“Okay? Oh, hey, hey. You can’t touch it.”
But the surprise didn’t end there.

“Stay by my side…”
Felix, whom she thought only as a friend for a long time, started to get weird?>
